sqlList.sql: select id, city_id, area_id, name_cn, name_en, name_jp, seq, dareaid, gbcode, pinyin, pinyin_short, sname, lname, zipcode, phonecode, hotelnum, longitude, latitude, status, create_time, update_time from t_lm_b_city where status='1' order by seq
select platform_code AS platformcode, platform_name AS platformname from t_lm_b_platform where status='1'
select PROP,LINKMAN, LINKEMAIL, LINKTEL, LINKFAX from t_lm_b_prop where PROP=:PROP

select PROP,prop_name_zh AS PROPNM from t_lm_b_prop where prop in (SELECT REGEXP_SUBSTR (:PROPS, '[^,]+', 1,rownum) FROM DUAL CONNECT BY ROWNUM <= LENGTH (:PROPS) - LENGTH (REPLACE (:PROPS, ',', '')))

select tlb.PROP,tlb.prop_name_zh AS PROPNM, (CASE WHEN tlb.diamond_rating Is null or tlb.diamond_rating < 1 THEN '0' ELSE '1' END) AS DIAHOTEL, (CASE WHEN tlb.diamond_rating Is null or tlb.diamond_rating < 1 THEN tlb.star_rating ELSE tlb.diamond_rating END ) AS STAR, (CASE WHEN tlb.TRADEAREA_ZH IS NULL OR tlb.TRADEAREA_ZH='' THEN tpf.TRADEAREA_ZH ELSE tlb.TRADEAREA_ZH END ) AS AREANM from t_lm_b_prop tlb left join FOG_T_PROP tpf on tlb.PROP=tpf.PROP where tlb.prop in (SELECT REGEXP_SUBSTR (:PROPS, '[^,]+', 1,rownum) FROM DUAL CONNECT BY ROWNUM <= LENGTH (:PROPS) - LENGTH (REPLACE (:PROPS, ',', '')))
select ROOM_CODE AS HOTELROOMCODE,ROOM_NAME AS HOTELROOMNM from t_room t where HOTEL_ID=:HOTELID and ROOM_CODE = :ROOMID

select tlbp.prop AS HOTELID, tlbp.prop_name_zh AS HOTELNMZH, tlbp.prop_name_en AS HOTELNMEN, tlbp.status AS FOGSTATUS, tlbp.cityid AS CITY, tlbp.diamond_rating AS DIAMOND, tlbp.star_rating AS STAR, tlbp.opening_date AS OPENDT, tlbp.renovated_date AS RENOVATIONDT, tlbp.tradearea_id AS TRADEAREA, tlbp.tradearea_zh AS TRADEAREANM, tlbp.address1_zh AS ADDRESS, tlbp.website AS WEBSITE, tlbp.linktel AS LINKTEL, tlbp.linkfax AS LINKFAX, tlbp.linkman AS LINKMAN, tlbp.linkemail AS LINKMAIL, tlbp.longitude AS LONGITUDE, tlbp.latitude AS LATITUDE, tlbp.HOTEL_DESCRIPTION_ZH AS DESCZH, ftp.prop_name_zh AS HOTELNMZH_F, ftp.prop_name_en AS HOTELNMEN_F, ftp.status AS FOGSTATUS_F, ftp.cityid AS CITY_F, ftp.diamond_rating AS DIAMOND_F, ftp.star_rating AS STAR_F, ftp.opening_date AS OPENDT_F, ftp.renovated_date AS RENOVATIONDT_F, ftp.tradearea_id AS TRADEAREA_F, ftp.tradearea_zh AS TRADEAREANM_F, ftp.address1_zh AS ADDRESS_F, ftp.website AS WEBSITE_F, tlh.tel AS LINKTEL_F, tlh.fax AS LINKFAX_F, tlh.linkman AS LINKMAN_F, tlh.mail AS LINKMAIL_F, ftp.longitude AS LONGITUDE_F, ftp.latitude AS LATITUDE_F, ftpd.property_zh AS DESCZH_F from t_lm_b_prop tlbp left join FOG_t_prop ftp on tlbp.prop=ftp.prop left join t_lm_hotel tlh on ftp.prop=tlh.hotel_id left join fog_t_prop_desc ftpd on ftp.prop=ftpd.prop where ((:CITYID IS NULL) OR (tlbp.cityid=:CITYID)) AND ((:PROP IS NULL) OR (tlbp.prop=:PROP))
update t_lm_b_prop set prop_name_zh=(select prop_name_zh from fog_t_prop where prop=:HOTELID) where prop=:HOTELID
update t_lm_b_prop set prop_name_en=(select prop_name_en from fog_t_prop where prop=:HOTELID) where prop=:HOTELID
update t_lm_b_prop set status=(select status from fog_t_prop where prop=:HOTELID) where prop=:HOTELID
update t_lm_b_prop set cityid=(select cityid from fog_t_prop where prop=:HOTELID) where prop=:HOTELID
update t_lm_b_prop set diamond_rating=(select diamond_rating from fog_t_prop where prop=:HOTELID) where prop=:HOTELID
update t_lm_b_prop set star_rating=(select star_rating from fog_t_prop where prop=:HOTELID) where prop=:HOTELID
update t_lm_b_prop set opening_date=(select opening_date from fog_t_prop where prop=:HOTELID) where prop=:HOTELID
update t_lm_b_prop set renovated_date=(select renovated_date from fog_t_prop where prop=:HOTELID) where prop=:HOTELID
update t_lm_b_prop set tradearea_id=(select tradearea_id from fog_t_prop where prop=:HOTELID),tradearea_zh=(select tradearea_zh from fog_t_prop where prop=:HOTELID) where prop=:HOTELID
update t_lm_b_prop set address1_zh=(select address1_zh from fog_t_prop where prop=:HOTELID) where prop=:HOTELID
update t_lm_b_prop set website=(select website from fog_t_prop where prop=:HOTELID) where prop=:HOTELID
update t_lm_b_prop set linktel=(select tel from t_lm_hotel where hotel_id=:HOTELID) where prop=:HOTELID
update t_lm_b_prop set linkfax=(select fax from t_lm_hotel where hotel_id=:HOTELID) where prop=:HOTELID
update t_lm_b_prop set linkman=(select linkman from t_lm_hotel where hotel_id=:HOTELID) where prop=:HOTELID
update t_lm_b_prop set linkemail=(select mail from t_lm_hotel where hotel_id=:HOTELID) where prop=:HOTELID
update t_lm_b_prop set longitude=(select longitude from fog_t_prop where prop=:HOTELID) where prop=:HOTELID
update t_lm_b_prop set latitude=(select latitude from fog_t_prop where prop=:HOTELID) where prop=:HOTELID
update t_lm_b_prop set HOTEL_DESCRIPTION_ZH=(select property_zh from fog_t_prop_desc where prop=:HOTELID) where prop=:HOTELID

select thp.id, thp.plan_id, thp.order_num, thp.ope_source, thp.ope_time, thp.operator, thp.ope_memo, thp.ope_msg, thp.ope_event from t_his_plan thp inner join t_lm_plan tlp on thp.plan_id = tlp.id where tlp.hotel_id=:HOTELID AND ((:STARTDT IS NULL) OR (TO_DATE(:STARTDT, 'yyyy-MM-dd') <= tlp.effect_date)) AND ((:ENDDT IS NULL) OR (TO_DATE(:ENDDT, 'yyyy-MM-dd') >= tlp.effect_date)) order by thp.ope_time desc

select cg.id AS HGroupID, cg.coregroup_name AS HGroupNM, nvl(cgd.iCount,0) AS DCOUNT, cg.create_user||' 于 '||TO_CHAR(create_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS CREATEINFO from t_lm_corehotelgroup cg left join (select coregroupid, count(id) AS iCount from t_lm_corehotelgroup_detail where status ='1' and (:GTYPE IS NULL OR GType=:GTYPE) and (:CUSER IS NULL OR CREATE_USER = :CUSER) group by coregroupid) cgd on cg.id=cgd.coregroupid where cg.id = :HGROUPID and cg.status='1'

select gt.id, gt.coregroupid, gt.hotel_id AS HOTELID, gt.prop_name_zh AS HOTELNM, gt.linkman AS LINKPER,gt.linktel AS LINKTEL,nvl(dt.RCOUNT,0) AS RCN, '' AS ONLINES,'' AS HVPMG,gt.STATUS AS FOGSTATUS,gt.ONLINE_STATUS AS ONLINESTATUS from (select cgd.id, cgd.coregroupid, cgd.hotel_id, bp.prop_name_zh,bp.linkman,bp.linktel,bp.STATUS,bp.ONLINE_STATUS from t_lm_corehotelgroup_detail cgd left join t_lm_b_prop bp on cgd.hotel_id =bp.prop where cgd.coregroupid=:HGROUPID and cgd.Gtype=:GTYPE and (:CUSER IS NULL OR cgd.CREATE_USER = :CUSER) and cgd.status='1') gt left join (select tp.hotel_id,count(tp.room_type_code) AS RCOUNT from t_lm_plan tp where tp.effect_date = TO_DATE(:DTime, 'yyyy/mm/dd') and tp.status='1' group by tp.hotel_id) dt on gt.hotel_id=dt.hotel_id
select id from t_lm_corehotelgroup_detail where coregroupid=:HGROUPID and hotel_id=:HOTELID and status='1' and GType=:GTYPE
select prop from t_lm_b_prop where prop=:HOTELID

merge into t_lm_corehotelgroup_detail t1 using (select :HGROUPID AS coregroupid, :HOTELID AS hotel_id,:CREATEUSER AS create_user,:GTYPE AS GType from dual) t2 on (t1.coregroupid = t2.coregroupid and t1.hotel_id = t2.hotel_id and t1.GType = t2.GType) when matched then update set t1.status='1', t1.update_time=sysdate, update_user=t2.create_user where t1.coregroupid = t2.coregroupid and t1.hotel_id = t2.hotel_id and t1.GType = t2.GType when not matched then insert values (t_lm_coregroup_detail_seq.nextval, t2.coregroupid, t2.hotel_id, '1', sysdate, t2.create_user, sysdate, t2.create_user, t2.GType)
Update t_lm_corehotelgroup_detail set status='0', update_time=sysdate,update_user=:CREATEUSER where coregroupid=:HGROUPID and hotel_id=:HOTELID and status='1' and GType=:GTYPE
SELECT * FROM t_lm_b_prop where prop=:PROP
